mapper.insert: insert into movie(genrecode1, genrecode2, genrecode3, title, story, nation, director, actor, year, releasedate, thumbnailSrc, thumbnailSrcUrl) values (#{genrecode1}, #{genrecode2}, #{genrecode3}, #{title}, #{story}, #{nation}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{year}, #{releasedate}, #{thumbnailSrc}, #{thumbnailSrcUrl})
mapper.select: select max(${seqMovie}) as seqMovie from movie
select * from movie where title = #{title} order by seqMovie desc limit 1
select count(*) as count from movie
mapper.insert: insert into `${seqMovie}` (ep, eptitle, epstory, runtime, thumbnail, grade, seqMovie) values(#{ep}, #{eptitle}, #{epstory}, #{runtime}, #{thumbnail}, #{grade}, #{seqMovie})
